featured_reviews.review_id:
The variety of toys and budget friendly options is great! The best part about the place was the two female employees. The first one made sure to check our IDS, made us feel welcome, and answered questions about the arcade for us. Unfortunately, I am giving a bad review because of guest behavior in the arcade. After a very negative occurrence in a booth with my partner, I came out very upset. The employee I met before and a whole different female instantly took care of me.
In summary, it's a cool experience and mine was spoiled by another guest. They care about safety and respect couples/females at Pleasures and it shows. However, if you are a younger couple I would not recommend mid-day. The scene might be different during the day. Definitely stop in and shop!

featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Oyuncak cesitliligi ve butce dostu secenekler harika! Yer hakkinda en iyi bolum, iki kadin calisandi. Ilki kimlik numaralarimizi kontrol etmemizi sagladi, bizi iyi karsiladi ve atari salonuyla ilgili sorulari bizim icin yanitladi. Ne yazik ki, atari salonundaki konuk davranislari nedeniyle kotu bir inceleme yapiyorum. Ortagimla bir stantta cok olumsuz bir olaydan sonra cok uzgun ciktim. Daha once tanistigim calisan ve bambaska bir kadin aninda benimle ilgilendi.
Ozetle, harika bir deneyim ve benimki baska bir konuk tarafindan simartildi. Zevklerde guvenligi onemsiyorlar ve ciftlere/kadinlara saygi duyuyorlar ve bunu gosteriyor. Ancak, daha genc bir ciftseniz, gun ortasi tavsiye etmem. Gun boyunca manzara farkli olabilir. Kesinlikle ugrayin ve alisveris yapin!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Geri bildiriminiz icin tesekkur ederiz, geri donmesine izin verilmeyen bu musterinin sergiledigi davranis icin ictenlikle ozur dileriz. Bununla birlikte, sehre geri donerseniz bizimle alisveris yapmak icin geri gelmenizi umuyoruz! size ve sizinkine en iyi dileklerimle!

featured_reviews.review_id:
This is a delightful little shop. It is clean, colorful, safe and fun. The staff member I spoke to was very professional and courteous. That part is extremely important given the nature of some of the wares. I really appreciated their ability to answer questions and keep me pointed in the right direction while I was shopping.

The selection of more niche products was greatly appreciated as well. There aren't many options in town for these types of products since The Crypt shut down.

Do make sure to check the listed hours. They aren't open every day but their website does have a bunch of fun stuff available for pre-order.

featured_reviews.review_id: I have a disability.. So, yesterday I needed to go into tight end to speak to The manager for less than 5 minutes. There was no parking in front of tight end, so I parked in the Adam and Eve parking lot which had no cars in it. The tow truck company had my car on the truck in less than 5 minutes. I told him that I have a disability and he did not care. All he wanted was the money. He demanded $80 or I wouldn't get my car back. In Denver it is illegal for tow truck companies to stalk people's cars. I've spent hundreds of dollars at this store. You should never do this to one of your native customers. I'm in sheer disbelief that they would do this to a disabled person. There were no cars in the parking lot. He's just picking me off trying to make a dollar. This disgusts me to be treated this way and I will never be back to the store again.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I would give 0 stars if possible. I'm not someone who typically writes reviews, but my friend and I had an awful experience here and I felt I should share with others.
Firstly, the guy with the gray beard gave us a nasty look when we first walked in and rudely asked to see IDs. Whatever. We were walking around the store, and we had stopped in a corner to take a look at some products. The same guy then calls me a "little girl" to somehow try and get me to put my bag at the front desk to prevent theft or whatever, which he should have mentioned to us as soon as we walked in, I would have happily done that if there was a sign or some indication in the shop of that rule.
I walk up to the desk, and this woman standing at the front rudely tells me that "it's actually pretty standard practice now" and continues to talk to me in a very rude and petty tone as I walk back to my friend. We immediately left after this happened.
TLDR: The employees made my friend and I super uncomfortable. Never going back and I don't recommend this place.
There was a very cute dog though. That was cool.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Mumkunse 0 yildiz verirdim. Genelde degerlendirme yazan biri degilim ama arkadasim ve ben burada cok kotu bir deneyim yasadik ve baskalariyla paylasmam gerektigini hissettim.
Ilk olarak, iceri girdigimizde gri sakalli adam bize kotu bir bakis atti ve kaba bir sekilde kimliklerimizi gormek istedi. Her neyse. Magazada dolasiyorduk ve bazi urunlere bakmak icin bir kosede durmustuk. Daha sonra ayni adam bana "kucuk kiz" diyor ve bir sekilde hirsizligi veya baska bir seyi onlemek icin cantami resepsiyona koymami saglamaya calisiyor ki, iceri girer girmez bunu bize soylemesi gerekirdi, memnuniyetle yapardim. eger magazada bu kuralin bir isareti ya da gostergesi olsaydi.
Masaya dogru yurudum ve on sirada duran bu kadin bana kaba bir sekilde "bunun artik oldukca standart bir uygulama oldugunu" soyledi ve ben arkadasimin yanina yururken benimle cok kaba ve dar goruslu bir ses tonuyla konusmaya devam etti. Bu olaydan hemen sonra oradan ayrildik.
TLDR: Calisanlar arkadasimi ve beni cok rahatsiz etti. Asla geri donmeyecegim ve burayi tavsiye etmiyorum.
Ama cok tatli bir kopek vardi. Harikaydi.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Orada bu kadar kotu bir zaman gecirmeniz bizi fazlasiyla hayal kirikligina ugratti, durumu duzeltmek icin uygun adimlari attik. Lutfen gun icinde iceri gelin ve yoneticiyi gorun.

featured_reviews.review_id: It's expensive but, when you have to have that special something tonight, not tomorrow or, next week, this location probably has it in stock. If not, order it from Amazon and save $20 or $50 to spend on additional toys or accessories. I've been shopping here for a few years off and on but have never been in the arcade. I've only been stalked once by a homeless looking dude and he was thrown out without my having to complain which says a ton about the staff. Regardless of who has been working, they are friendly, non-judgemental, and not aggressive about sales. I hope they return to 24/7 hours soon (as well as everyone else who started closing because of the Vid - looking at you Walmart!).

featured_reviews.review_id: I was looking for flavored lubes, it's across the street. I checked the reviews, because what if it was creepy and I go alone? I should also note that when I went over, I was moderately high, and I had two missions. 1) purchase the lube, and 2) write a helpful review, because there aren't many, and I was high, so it sounded like a fun project. I always see a man outside/inside, an employee, and I thought it might get weird because it felt like he was "lurking". Same man was there working when I walked in, and he couldn't have been more helpful and polite. First product I picked up was  $35, which blew a hole through my budget. But it's an specialty adult store (and probably not the cheapest one), and cheaper things are bought on the internet, right? I had another question and easily flagged down another employee, a really awesome woman who had all the answers. She even showed me the taste-test bottles up front. I ended up buying a cleaner for my toy, and I'll totally go back when I want to get something on the fancier side after I get a paycheck. Someone mentioned that it looked like the products have been there for years, I mean it's not like they're flying off the shelf, nobody needs new equipment every day of the week? I didn't feel like anyone was shouting and not using their "inside voice", I don't need them to whisper like I'm being a weirdo. I thought about doing 4 stars, because of the prices, but I was really kind of prepared for the prices; this review is more about the atmosphere and the employees that I interacted with. It's not the fanciest, most modern interior, and when you approach you think should I do this for sure? Great experience for me, at least.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Aromali yaglar ariyordum, caddenin karsisinda. Degerlendirmeleri kontrol ettim, cunku ya tuyler urpertici olsaydi ve yalniz gidersem? Sunu da belirtmeliyim ki oraya gittigimde orta derecede kafam iyiydi ve iki gorevim vardi. 1) madeni yagi satin alin ve 2) yararli bir inceleme yazin, cunku cok fazla yoktu ve kafam iyiydi, bu yuzden kulaga eglenceli bir proje gibi geldi. Her zaman disarida/iceride bir adam, bir calisan goruyorum ve bunun tuhaflasabilecegini dusundum cunku sanki "gizleniyormus" gibi hissettim. Iceri girdigimde ayni adam orada calisiyordu ve bundan daha yardimsever ve kibar olamazdi. Aldigim ilk urun 35 dolardi, bu da butcemde buyuk bir bosluk yaratti. Ama burasi yetiskinlere yonelik ozel bir magaza (ve muhtemelen en ucuzu degil) ve internetten daha ucuz seyler satin aliniyor, degil mi? Baska bir sorum daha vardi ve tum cevaplari bilen gercekten harika bir kadin olan baska bir calisani kolayca isaretledim. Hatta bana on taraftaki tat testi siselerini bile gosterdi. Oyuncagim icin bir temizleyici satin aldim ve maas cekini aldiktan sonra daha merakli bir sey almak istedigimde kesinlikle geri donecegim. Birisi urunlerin yillardir oradaymis gibi gorundugunu soyledi, yani raftan ucup gitmiyorlar, kimsenin haftanin her gunu yeni ekipmana ihtiyaci yok mu? Kimsenin bagirdigini ve "ic sesini" kullanmadigini hissetmedim, sanki tuhaf davraniyormusum gibi fisildamalarina ihtiyacim yok. Fiyatlardan dolayi 4 yildiz vermeyi dusundum ama aslinda fiyatlara biraz hazirlikliydim; Bu inceleme daha cok atmosfer ve etkilesimde bulundugum calisanlarla ilgili. En gosterisli, en modern ic mekan degil ve yaklastiginizda bunu kesinlikle yapmali miyim diye dusunuyorsunuz? En azindan benim icin harika bir deneyim.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Romantix took over October 1st, 2016. All previous reviews are not for the new store FYI!!
The old store used to be called Secrets.
The new store = Very bright and clean, largest selection in town of adult products and priced very competitively! The staff is very knowledgeable & extremely friendly. You can tell they love their jobs and want to provide you with the best possible options! The hours are great, I feel very comfortable shopping here, and **it's one of the Boutique styles in town for anyone that just wants to shop!*** Some of the other locations have arcade/preview rooms as well as the product for sale, but I know different strokes for different folks. ;)
Give it a shot, I can 99.99% guarantee you'll be pleasantly surprised and happy that you stopped by! The new management and staff really make this place a great environment.

featured_reviews.review_id:
This place offers a lot of different "activities" and that may be the main draw for most people. I can't speak to how good or bad that aspect is because that's not what I came here for.

I just came here to look for some new toys. As a toy store, it's somewhat mediocre in my opinion. They have a lot of stuff, but most of it is off brand type stuff, which just isn't what I personally go for. I didn't see any of the major brands as I was walking around the store. Maybe they keep those items hidden away or something. I don't know. But, I probably won't be back here. I'll probably stick to Fascinations for my toy buying needs for the time being.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Burasi bircok farkli "aktivite" sunuyor ve cogu insan icin asil cekicilik bu olabilir. Bu yonun ne kadar iyi ya da kotu oldugunu soyleyemem cunku buraya bunun icin gelmedim.

Buraya yeni oyuncaklar aramaya geldim. Bir oyuncak magazasi olarak bence biraz vasat. Cok fazla seyleri var ama cogu marka disi seyler, ki bu benim kisisel olarak tercih ettigim sey degil. Magazada dolasirken buyuk markalardan hicbirini gormedim. Belki bu esyalari gizli falan tutuyorlardir. Bilmiyorum. Ama muhtemelen buraya geri donmeyecegim. Simdilik oyuncak satin alma ihtiyaclarim icin muhtemelen Fascinations'a bagli kalacagim.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Bu yerin 9 aydir inceleme yapilmamasini haksiz buluyorum. Bu magazanin guler yuzlu personeli her zaman ihtiyacim olani bulmami sagliyor ve herhangi bir sorum olup olmadigini her zaman kontrol ediyor. Ben ne istedigimden emin olmadigim bir seyi aramak icin zaman harcayan turden bir alisverisciyim Ne aradigim ya da ne istedigim konusunda bir sonuca varmak icin ihtiyac duydugum kadar zaman ayirabilirim satin almak icin hicbir zaman aceleye getirilmis gibi bir sorun ya da buna benzer bir sey yasamadim. Gecen yil ile bu yil ve bu yil arasinda bircok kez magazaya gittim ve onceki tum bu incelemelerin ne kadar muhtesem oldugunu anlamiyorum, bazilari 4 yasinda ama magazaya giriyorum temiz, duzenli ve personel iyi ilgileniyor, guleryuzlu, yardimsever ve bilgili. Bu magazayla hicbir sorunum yok ve bence siz onlara bir sans verip deneyimlerinizi bizimle paylasmalisiniz.
